verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> Get thee <S%H1980>out<s%> of thy <S%H4480>country,<s%> <S%H776><s%> and from thy <S%H4480>kindred,<s%> <S%H4138><s%> and from thy father's <S%H4480>house,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H1><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I will <S%H7200>show<s%> thee:

And I will <S%H6213>make<s%> of thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and make thy name <S%H1431>great;<s%> <S%H8034><s%> and thou shalt <S%H1961>be<s%> a blessing: <S%H1293><s%>

And I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them that <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and <S%H779>curse<s%> him that <S%H7043>curseth<s%> thee: and in thee shall <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

So <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H1980>departed,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him; and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him: and <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H3318>departed<s%> out of <S%H4480>Haran.<s%> <S%H2771><s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7399>substance<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they had <S%H7408>gathered,<s%> and the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they had <S%H6213>gotten<s%> in <S%H2771>Haran;<s%> and they went <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%> and into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> they <S%H935>came.<s%>

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H7927>Sichem,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh.<s%> And the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> was <S%H227>then<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Unto thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> he an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> who <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him.

And he <S%H6275>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> unto a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the <S%H4480>east<s%> <S%H6924><s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> his <S%H168>tent,<s%> having <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> on the <S%H4480>west,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> and <S%H5857>Hai<s%> on the <S%H4480>east:<s%> <S%H6924><s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> upon the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed,<s%> going <S%H1980>on<s%> <S%H5265>still<s%> toward the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land:<s%> and <S%H87>Abram<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was <S%H3515>grievous<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he was come <S%H7126>near<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art a <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> to look upon: <S%H4758><s%>

Therefore it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> thee, that they shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is his <S%H802>wife:<s%> and they will <S%H2026>kill<s%> me, but they will save thee <S%H2421>alive.<s%>

Say, <S%H559><s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H269>sister:<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with me for thy <S%H5668>sake;<s%> and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> because <S%H1558>of<s%> thee.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that, when <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3303>fair.<s%>

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> also of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, and <S%H1984>commended<s%> her <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And he entreated Abram <S%H3190>well<s%> <S%H87><s%> for her <S%H5668>sake:<s%> and he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and he <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and <S%H8198>maidservants,<s%> and she <S%H860>asses,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5060>plagued<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and his <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5061>plagues<s%> because <S%H5921>of<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H87>Abram's<s%> <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%> unto me? <S%H4100>why<s%> didst thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> was thy <S%H802>wife?<s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> <S%H559>saidst<s%> thou, <S%H1931>She<s%> is my <S%H269>sister?<s%> so I might have <S%H3947>taken<s%> her to me to <S%H802>wife:<s%> now <S%H6258>therefore<s%> <S%H2009>behold<s%> thy <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> her, and go thy <S%H1980>way.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> him: and they sent him <S%H7971>away,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had.
